title: DNEVNA KREMA PROTI GUBAM MULTIACTIVE, GREEN LINE, 50ML

product-info.opis: Intenzivna dnevna krema proti gubam Green Line Multiactive za nego zrele kože po 40. letu. Izvleček granatnega jabolka kožo globinsko obnavlja, gladi gubice in učvrščuje. Karitejevo maslo jo neguje in ji vrača žametno mehkobo. Izvleček aloe vere kožo intenzivno vlaži in ščiti.

ingredient-information.sestavine: AQUA, GLYCERIN, DICAPRYLYL CARBONATE, PROPYLHEPTYL CAPRYLATE, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII BUTTER, GLYCERYL STEARATE, OCTYLDODECANOL, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, SUCROSE POLYSTEARATE, HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE, ARGANIA SPINOSA OIL, SACCHARIDE ISOMERATE, ALOE BARBADENSIS EXTRACT, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, PUNICA GRANATUM EXTRACT, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, ACETYL HEXAPEPTIDE-8, CREATINE, SODIUM STEAROYL GLUTAMATE, POLYACRYLAMIDE, LAURETH-7, MICA, PARFUM, C 13-14 ISOPARAFFIN, PHENOXYETHANOL, METHYLPARABEN, BUTYLPARABEN, ETHYLPARABEN, PROPYLPARABEN, ISOBUTYLPARABEN, IMIDAZOLIDINYL UREA, CI 77891, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYL SILANE, LACTIC ACID, LIMONENE, LINALOOL, BUTHYLPHENYL METHYLPROPIONAL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, BHT.
